profile:
Introduction

EPF Pro Services provide a Professional Popcorn Ceiling Removal, residential and commercial interior, exterior and handyman services. Our company serving the customers across the GTA area. Our house experts using the top of the range painting products and tools for the best result of the painting and renovation projects.
More About Us

***


All our work are guaranteed for 5 year warranty. EPF Pro Services specialize with attention to the details. Having done your  project by EPF Pro Company you can be assured of a high quality service everywhere and every time !

***

Why use EPF Pro Services:

***


•Two - Five Year Guarantee On All Work Done 
•25 Years Experience in the Painting , Plastering and Renovation  Industry 
•Thousands of Satisfied Clients 
•Top Quality Paints Used Including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, Para etc 
•Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings 
•100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!!
Interior Services Include: 
•Painting (i.e. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.) 
• Popcorn Ceiling Removal and refinishing
•Stucco Painting and Repair 
•Wallpapering and Removal 
•Drywall Repair and Replacement 
•Plaster
Exterior Painting Services Include: 
•Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.) 
•Caulking 
•Rotten Wood Replacement/Repair
Kitchen  Cabinet Refinishing Include: 

Cabinet Refinishing
Cabinet Remodeling
Cabinet Spray Painting

Crown molding installation 
Water Damaged Doors Restoration
100% Satisfaction guaranteed 

Full Warranty
Reasonable pricing
We Provide Detailed Quotes

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.

profile:
Ceiling Champions services the GTA and surrounding area's for stucco "popcorn" removal, repair, and refinishing of ceilings. We also can provide you with Crown Moulding, Painting, and PotLights. We also renovate Kitchens, Bathroom, and Cabinet Designs.

Ceiling Champions are here to restore or improve your ceiling or renovation project to 100% and beyond. Our top quality workmanship and attention to detail continue to earn confidence with homeowners in the GTA.

If you’re in the GTA; Etobicoke, Mississauga, Brampton, Ajax, Pickering, Oakville or nearby area, please give us a call to discuss stucco removal, ceiling repair, custom closets, kitchens & bathrooms, Crown Moulding or any other drywall related renovation.

R.M.G. Contracting Inc been around since 2010 , we are specialized in popcorn removal , taping new drywall, plaster repairs, and painting. We always make sure the job is done on time , to perfection, and clean the whole way through. 

Pricing:
- Non-painted stucco $3.50 per sqf. including painting the ceilings , protect the floors and cleaning.
- Painted stucco $4.50 per sqf. Price is fixed - no hidden fees.

profile:
Maple Express Painting, Toronto is a full service painting and renovating company providing service to residents of Toronto and the rest of GTA. We specialize in exterior and interior painting of both residential and commercial projects. No job is too big or small for us. We provide a complete range of painting services, and with well over a decade of experience in the industry.

We provide full service home renovation services including drywall repair and installation, caulking, stucco work, as well as general contracting work. Our stellar reputation of high quality service and fast and efficient work has helped us to grow our business phenomenally.

We service Toronto, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markam, Newmarket, Mississauga, Brampton, Milton, Aurora, Etobicoke, Scarborough, and the rest of the GTA. Phone us today to transform your property into a marvel!

Why would you choose to use Maple Express Painting
• We provide Guarantee on all our work
• Fully bonded workers
• Hundreds of satisfied clients to provide reference of work
• Use of top quality paint including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, Para etc.
• We are exceptionally clean and tidy and utilize drop sheets for every job.

Home Renovations - remodeling living rooms, living space, corridors, ceilings, flooring.

Bathrooms - remodeling or building from scratch - experience in tiling, grouting, painting, priming, tile installation (marble, ceramic, laminate), plumbing, bathtub and toilet installation

Kitchens - remodeling or installation of new kitchen - we do everything from tiling, standard and custom made cupboard installation, backsplash, painting, countertop (laminate or granite) installation, plumbing, etc.

Painting - priming, painting, puttying, spraying sanding - walls, ceilings, staining 

Plastering - taping, patching, skimming 
walls/ceilings 

PHONE NUMBER: (647) 703-0020
Email: maplexpainting@gmail.com

profile:
About Meehan Plastering and Drywall owner Gavin Meehan

***

I started off my trade as an apprentice working under a master plasterer in ireland,after many years of mastering my craft i decided to bring my skills to Canada,since arriving in Canada i had being working for drywall and plastering companies getting accustomed to dealing with new working environments and customer needs and specifications.At Meehan plastering and drywall we have over 10 years experience in all aspects of the plastering trade from drywall installation,drywall finishing the highly sought after diamond veneer plaster.We also specialise in Foundation repairs,concrete stairs face lifts and anything parging related.Me and my highly skilled workers offer the highest quality finishes and take pride in our work no matter how big or small the project is. We look forward to hearing from you.

specialities: diamond venner plaster,this method of plastering is the traditional way to plaster in europe,the pros of this method is that there is no sanding and is a higher quality finish than regular drywall compound,it is also a quick way of removing popcorn ceilings most can be done within the same day kindly as for information if unsure about the process

profile:
ALF PAINTING SERVICE

If you're looking for a professional painting and home renovation company with years of experience to prove it, then look no further, ALF Painters is the contractor for you. We specialize in interior, exterior, residential, and commercial painting and our services don't stop there! We can also help you with drywall repair and installation, plaster, stucco ceiling repair and removal, carpentry, Kitchen Cabinet repainting, hardwood flooring and much more! Call one of our customer service experts now and be well on your way to a quote and a beautifully transformed property.

Serving Toronto, Mississauga and the grater GTA area!

Remember when you go with ALF Painting Service we value your business and referrals and are committed to getting it done right the first time. GUARANTEED!

Why use Home Painters to paint your house/office?
•Two Year Guarantee On All Work Done
•Full Workers Compensation
•5 Million Liability Insurance
•Fully Bonded Workers (Criminal Background Checks on ALL Workers)
•Thousands of Satisfied Clients
•Top Quality Paints Used Including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, Para etc
•Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings
•100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!!

Interior Painting Services Include:
•Painting (i.e. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.)
•Staining (i.e. banisters, hardwood floors, cabinets, etc.)
•Faux finishing
•Stucco Painting and Repair
•Wallpapering and Removal
•Drywall Repair and Replacement
•Plaster

Exterior Painting Services Include:
•Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.)
•Deck/Fence Staining and Refinishing
•Power Washing
•Caulking
•Rotten Wood Replacement/Repair

profile: Our story began in 2010. We provide a wide range of painting services in GTA area including Toronto, Markham, Richmond Hills, Vaughan, Mississaguga, Brampton, Oakville. We have experienced professional painters, quality paints to finish all our jobs. We can paint your house, refinish your kitchen cabinet, remove popcorn ceilings, paint your background wall, instal pot lights. Our purpose is simple: Fast, Clean, Quality, Insured. We do our jobs always on time and budget. We clean every mess, make sure you get a clean house. No paint will stay where it should not supposed to be. We are professional at doing our jobs to satisfy all your needs with premium materials. We service all our clients to get a smile from all our jobs.
